Package javax.slee.serviceactivity

Interface Summary
ServiceActivity This interface is implemented by Service activity objects.
ServiceActivityContextInterfaceFactory The Service Activity Context Interface Factory is used by SBBs to obtain an ActivityContextInterface object for a Service activity.
ServiceActivityFactory The Service Activity Factory is used by SBBs to get their Service activity object.
ServiceStartedEvent This interface is implemented by Service started events genererated by the SLEE when a Service is started.
